featured.text: Knight’s traffic signal was installed near London’s Westminster Bridge in December 1868, but the system was short-lived.

definition.zh_def: 安裝，將軟體或設備放置在可使用的狀態。
definition.en_def: To set up software or equipment for use.
definition.example: I need to install the new software on my computer.
